entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 60 this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023
